amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws necessary to protect school children from exposure to dangerous conditions in schools, including exposure to asbestos and lead paint.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments, offered en bloc, to exempt from the provisions of the bill those laws and regulations necessary to protect school children from exposure to dangerous conditions in schools, including exposure to asbestos, radon, and lead paint. (Text of the amendments were printed as amendment Nos. 43 and 44 in the Congressional Record of January 19, 1995.).

action.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendments (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 297 (Roll no. 65).
